name: CloudLoadTest
description: Runs the load test in cloud, with Visual Studio Online
helpMarkDown: This task can be used to trigger a Cloud-based Load Test using Visual Studio Online. [Learn more](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=546976).
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Registered connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a previously registered service connection to talk to the Cloud-based Load Test service. Choose 'Manage' to register a new connection.

inputs.name: TestSettings
inputs.label: Test settings file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root for the test settings file to use for the load test.

inputs.name: TestDrop
inputs.label: Load test files folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root where the load test solution build output will be available.

inputs.name: LoadTest
inputs.label: Load test file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The load test filename to be used under the load test folder specified above.

inputs.name: ThresholdLimit
inputs.label: Number of permissible threshold violations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of threshold violations above which the load test outcome is considered unsucessful.
